name: WarIR - [AI-Sandbox]
description:
This is WarIR! a AI sandbox game where you pit Artificial intelligence against each other to fight to the death! (for educational reasons of course). And build arenas for them to fight in.

How does the AI work?

Every time they die they remember why they died, and every time they get a kill they remember what got them that kill. so through trial and error and maturing they go from wall shooting idiots to 360 no scoping MLG pro's

What's the gameplay like?

Gameplay consist of creating arenas and having the little guys fighting to the death. it takes a little while for them to learn but u can speed up time to let them train faster. This is a good game for when your doing work and you want to come back to see something entertaining when you are done or if u just have no idea what u want to do and you just wanna zone out to watching AI mindlessly kill each other. more of a calm relaxing game then an action game.
